mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE ((SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM TB_PRODUCT_REQ WHERE USER_CODE=#{userCode} AND PRODUCT_CODE=#{productCode} LIMIT 1), 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_REQ (PRODUCT_CODE, USER_CODE, REQ_CONTENT, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES ( #{productCode}, #{userCode}, #{requestContent}, now(), now());
